title: How Semrush Content Marketing Toolkit can help you
content:
Content Marketing

Semrush’s Content Marketing Platform is designed to help content marketers streamline their tasks and create content that resonates with their audience. This toolkit makes it easy to create and improve your existing content plan, find content gaps, or research and write content. Use it to find high-performing content ideas, generate SEO-rich briefs, create copy with AI, and optimize it for users and search engines. These efforts can save you both time and money. 

Please note: all tools in our Content Marketing Platform are only available in full with a Guru or Business level subscription. Take a free trial of Guru today.

Go to the Content Marketing Platform
